name: Leave Your Mark (skammerman, Rebellite)
description:
This is a game about a bored wannabe knight named Mark. Please experience a small slice of Mark's daily life. The game was crafted with lots of love from Cheems' Dream Team.

Controls: WASD/Arrow Keys to Move. F to interact. Space to progress dialogue.

Disclaimer: All assets are original work, except for the music, which was sourced royalty-free from bensound.com/royalty-free-music/track/sweet
